attributes.action: Disband the entire RSPCA network as they do not realy help all animals as they state, fur and feathers may be but not any other exotic animals, there needs to be a specialist exotic pet rescue service set up
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: The RSPCA is a registered charity and therefore falls outside the remit of government.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
